situation.title: Measures on free movement
situation.meta_description: Free movement in the Czech Republic is limited at the moment.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Presently, free movement of people is banned in the Czech Republic. There are otherwise few exceptions.

From 23:00 to 4:59 (during the curfew) free movement is permitted only for:

  • individuals commuting to work,
  • individuals carrying out activity related to safety or health protection,
  • individuals providing supply and delivery services,
  • individuals walking a dog max 500 meters from their residency.

You can also leave your residency during the curfew in cases of urgency (visit a hospital, floods, etc.).

Outside the curfew (from 5:00 to 22:59) is movement less limited. It is allowed to commute to work, to visit a family of close persons (a close person is one whose suffering you would feel like your own, it can be for example your girlfriend/boyfriend), to buy basic goods (food, medicaments, food and medicaments for pets), to visit a public office, post office or to get individual spiritual care. All exceptions from the ban of free movement outside the curfew are available here.

However, the time outside our place of residence should now be limited to what is necessary. Please also limit contact with other people.

Gathering at publicly accessible places are limited to max 6 people, it is necessary to retain 2 meters distance from others, other clusters respectively. This does not apply to household members (the person you live with), or for example co-workers/colleagues, in this case, they may be more than two.

questions_answers.question: Can I commute to work
questions_answers.value: Yes, commuting to work is allowed.

questions_answers.question: Can I travel in order to visit my family?
Can I visit my girlfriend/boyfriend if I don't live with her/him?
questions_answers.value: Yes, if this person is close to you.

questions_answers.question: Can I go to a wedding or a funeral?
Can I go to visit my cabin or cottage?
Can I travel by train or intercity transport?
questions_answers.value: Yes. However, due to the smaller number of passengers, the number of connections was reduced. Please, check the schedule closely.

questions_answers.question: I am abroad, can I transit through the territory of the Czech Republic?,
Can I travel to leave the Czech Republic?
Can I go to visit my GP?
Is it possible to visit car repair shop to change the tires on my car?
Can I visit public office in order to exchange my identity card?
Can I organize a hiking trip with friends?
Can I walk the dog?
questions_answers.value: Yes, even during the curfew. Please stay within 500 meters from your residency while walking the dog during the curfew.

questions_answers.question: Can I walk the dog while in the quarantine or self-isolation?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but only if it is absolutely necessary and this activity cannot be provided by another person. Please be careful and try to avoid contact with others.

questions_answers.question: Can I stay in a spa (or similar service) for a purpose of recreation?
questions_answers.value: No. Recreational stay is not possible at the moment.

questions_answers.question: Is business travel allowed?
questions_answers.value: Yes. For this purpose, you can use accommodation services.

questions_answers.question: Can I visit the church?
questions_answers.value: Yes. Please be aware that masses are currently limited to 20 people at most.
